title: Can't play
body:
So i loaded up league and i'm at a hotel i was going to play  bot game but the internet decided to act as if it was unsecure which caused league to break and it said something about it couldn't be patched and will return to some version next time i logged on or something like that. And now league won't load. It shows the League Of Legends icon thing but the actual program won't load, I've tried running as Administrator but that doesn't work either. And i know you're probably thinking "Just submit a ticket" I rather not have to wait 3 months for someone to do nothing when i'm sure someone here has had this problem and knows what to do. 
Thanks

replies.body:
Hmmmm it almost sounds like something went wrong with some of the game files if it reverted to a previous patch to update again. Most of the time that will only happen when some of your game files become damaged or somehow corrupted. 

If you can grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **Force Repatch**, you should be able to get back on the Rift!
